page.name: Course References and Resources
page.intro: This page lists references and resources used throughout the course. A unit-specific resources handout is also available in each course unit above.
page.content:
These resources provide more in-depth information about the concepts and practices taught in this course. Use the resources to apply the concepts and to expand your knowledge of energy literacy into your adult education classroom.

You may want to save or print this screen for future use.

AirNow. (n.d.). Air Quality Index (AQI) basics. https://www.airnow.gov/aqi/aqi-basics/

Barclay, E. (2012). A nation of meat eaters: See how it all adds up. NPR. http://www.npr.org/blogs/thesalt/2012/06/27/155527365/visualizing-a-nation-of-meat-eaters
